price: and We will make you dwell in the land after them. This is for those who fear standing before Me[6], and who fear My warning.”
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ
